website_summaries.verdict: If you want a set that's both affordable and packed with everything you'll need, consider this robust Trailblaze slackline.
pros: This 42-foot long slackline kit includes a training line, two tree protectors, and an 8-inch long ratchet loop
Ratchet loop is great for anchoring to larger trees
Beginners will find the shorter length comfortable
cons: The shorter length may underwhelm older slackliners
Tree pads are on the small side

customer_reviews.title: No problems. Worked perfect. Whole family was able to get on it at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the original systems that cost a lot more money. This kit seems as heavy duty. Ive taken my kids out on it already no problem. I have a 7 and a 3 year old. they LOVED it. Look on the internet and make sure you know how to use a ratchet. That minute of your life may save you 15 minutes of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Nobu

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, easy setup, good instructions suitable for 14yo
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed. The lines are 1970s grade seat belts of that helps - very strong and will hold for many years with minor care. The ratchets are super easy - easy enough for a large yet as yet uncoordinated 14yo to handle. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My Grandchildren played on this every day during a week long visit. Easy to use and set up. They got better each day . I have this set up at about 35-38 feet and its challenging enough to keep them engaged. At 35-38 feet, it sways a bit. I think they could master it at about 25 feet apart. I can see this lasting for many years if the ratchet holds up, It looks to be built very well.
customer_reviews.author: jeffmc29

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great & lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We set this up in our backyard and our kids are out on it regularly. I have one who is a sensory seeker and he loves to just bounce on it. It's held up well for the past two years. We did have to move it up a few inches recently because we noticed that the trees were bulging a little around it. Our kids vary in height so we have a carabiner that slides along the top line that our younger children can use for balance since they can't reach as high as our older children. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaMomof4

customer_reviews.title: My First Slackline
customer_reviews.text: Since we don't have trees in our backyard, I dug two holes two foot deep and put a 10 foot rounded pole down on each and covered with cement. My little girl has been playing with it and it's fun. This is an addition to her home activities while waiting for the coronavirus to die out. This product would have gotten a five stars if it wasn't for the issue in my pictures. I am not sure if it will affect the slackline in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Hoan B.

customer_reviews.title: Pros outweigh cons
customer_reviews.text: Positives: The slack line and green guide are great. We’ve used with 3 year old up to 260 lbs adult. I recommend this product! Negatives: The very sparse instruction manual says “do not use in icy conditions” yet they have one really poor video that has a person installing in the snow. The instructions could be so much better. Also, should include the tip to leave slack (not taught) when not using as to maintain the integrity of the line. Tree protectors are way too short. We had to use carpet for our mature trees. Belt straps on tree protection broke first hour. They are non-essential fortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for an adventurous 5 year old who's parents are quite simply tired if being inundated with toys and it,was a great choice. Their 5 kids as well as my oldest 2 love it. The dads get quite a kick out of it themselves. It seems like a quality piece of equipment that should bring enjoyment for years.
customer_reviews.author: momtofive

customer_reviews.title: Great coordination challenge and fun for kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We set up the slack line within minutes for our two granddaughters, ages 4 and 8. They used the training line above to help steady their steps, but both of them were successful,and their coordination improved with each new attempt to "walk the line." They were having so much fun that even Granddad and Gigi had to give it a try! And, neighbors saw us and wanted to come play, too! Thank you for a very sturdy, safe and fun product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product fun to learn on great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Single band thick, perfect for training on. Very fun! After about 5 uses though I can already tell it is fraying a little bit. A bit of a bummer, but it is the intro line so maybe I just need to find a different one once I've learned how to walk on this one. Thank you for the cool toy! Update- perfect to learn. Not trick on though. Good intro product! Ratchet feels loose after lots of use, line is frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to set up, the kids love it!!! The only thing I would have liked would be better set up instructions, or a link to a video showing how to set up. Actually though, it is pretty simple and we figured it out after a few minutes. It is nice to buy a well made product. Set It up between 2 trees 30 feet apart and still plenty of line left over for further apart trees, and our trees are 3-5 feet in circumference. Very satisfied !!
customer_reviews.author: dlnewyork

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This slack line was a hit with all the kids on our camping trip. All the kids were climbing on it and having a blast. The tree bands are great to prevent the straps from tearing on tree bark. I previously had tried regular come-along straps but they started to tear.
customer_reviews.author: smiltos

customer_reviews.title: Stretches to much
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren and they love it. But am disappointed with the material. After kids each taking turns on it. 3 kids 1 try each the strap stretched to the point I had to tighten it. Thought I just didn't have it tight enough in the first place but no this happens everytime they are on it. They are not heavy . Maybe the heaviest 88 lbs. Need to tighten it every 10 to 15 min. While they are using it
customer_reviews.author: coin fun

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to our backyard activity list. If you have kids and some mature trees around the yard then this is a must have. Great buy during COVID times.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic option for a beginner slack line. We've been taking it camping this last few weeks and it's been a hit! The lead line that you can put above the main line is really nice for those who haven't yet tried this fun activity. Only thing I would recommend is for the bag that comes with it for storage be a bit bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it
customer_reviews.text: Being stuck at home due to C19, we online shopped for Easter. We bought this because we live in the woods and have trees everywhere. Now that we are remote schooling for the rest of the year, we wanted a reason for them to put down the electronics and get outside. So far so good! It was very easy to install and has held the weight of both my boys ages 7 & 9. I know, one at a time, but you tell young boys that and see how long it lasts! We also bought a zipline, will review that separately.
customer_reviews.author: #1David Whitnack

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product...so far
customer_reviews.text: Product looks and feels like quality. As with all products like these that are subject to stress, reliability will be a concern. So far it’s been proven to be great but we’ll see how time and use affects it. I’d highly recommend it for now and I’ll update my review in the future, for better of worse.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids to enjoy at our summer home. They had such a good time. It was easy to set up and worth every cent. Our 5 year old all the way up to 14yr. had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Davylyn

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as advertised. I had a small problem getting the ratchet to work right, but i watched a bad video. Its super simple and takes 5 minuets to set up. It held me (190) and my niece(almost 4) loved it. Her tiny feet fit perfect on it so she was pretty good. Oddly most of her enjoymeny came from just bouncing on it
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and exercise for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 and walks on this everyday. The guide line is a must for beginners. Especially helpful for me when I'm walking backwards and holding my daughter's hand as she walks without using the guide line. We like to challenge rather as to how many steps we can take without holding on. Great exercise. I could feel it in my legs the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my 11 year old boys and so far they love it. Can’t walk across it yet but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old boys and so far they love it. Can’t walk across it yet but they keep trying. The ratchet is a little tricky at first but we figured it out. All around it’s been a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Chereen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Materials used are high grade, and finishing is top notch - I'm confident I can leave this setup in my backyard and it will withstand the weather changes for a long time. It was very easy to setup; I like also that it already comes with felt to protect the tree trunks - well thought out. If you want to setup this up in parks, etc. it also comes with a convenient bag to carry it around. All in all, great product for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Maiko Rocha

customer_reviews.title: An amzing producta
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! Multiple ideas for use and enough work to wear them out. The practice strap however did not last a full week before fraying and needed duct tape repair to extend life. I would consider buying an extra strap or two if your kids are going to take a while to get along without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R. Timm

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put up and the training line is a ...
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this for my daughter's 15th bday. She loves it and so do all her younger siblings! Very easy to put up and the training line is a must for any beginner...ever my husband needed it and he's pretty athletic and fit.
customer_reviews.author: WImama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and gets kids outside!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our ninja warrior course. We had only one line for swinging from one obstacle to the next and after a few frustrating tries my kids wouldn’t touch it. So I bought a trailblazer slackline to go under it and my kids spend way more time outside on it. I installed it all myself with a ladder and it was pretty simple. Th printed directions are helpful and easy to follow. Only gave 4 stars for durability bc we’ve only had it up for a few days, so I will update after a couple months. Overall great product and I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Scott

customer_reviews.title: FUN +HEALTH BENEFITS
customer_reviews.text: The slackline kit is as advertised, substantial for kids and adults, and very colorful. I bought the slack line kit for my grandkids who visit from Alaska each summer. They spent a lot of time perfecting their techniques on the slackline and the music of their laughter filled our yard especially when their grandparents walked the line (only with the help of the training line.). Health benefits include muscle strengthening, coordination and balance improvement.
customer_reviews.author: RHOD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, good price. Attractive. Will hold a LOT of weight. Overhead helper line is great for beginners. The short line for holding over the topline could be a couple feet longer but that is a small negative.
customer_reviews.author: BXC

customer_reviews.title: Just as good if not better than the more popular brand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slackline for the price. I was going back and forth between this one and the slackers brand. I really didn't like the bright green color of slackers and this one came with the tree protecters and cost less. I'm glad I went with this one. The whole family has had lots of fun on it. Our kids are 8 & 10 and just love it. The tree protecters could be longer. We had to use both on one tree.
customer_reviews.author: KathyE

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Altogether a great decision for my first time learning to slack line. Holds my weight perfectly, and my partner’s (he weighs 260). Definitely recommend watching YouTube videos on slacklining before you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: NOT 60 feet long
customer_reviews.text: I like this slack-line kit. It is made well and the grand-kids are loving it. However, it says on the box that it is 60 feet long. That is not correct. It is more like 50 feet long at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but make sure your tree is under 8’ wide!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but the ratchet side of the one end cannot fit around our very big mature trees. It’s been great so far - kids love it and seems fairly safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nabia

customer_reviews.title: Quit slacking and buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal product! Perfect beginner package. If your starting out this is the kit for you. I've had a decent amount of slack experience and was looking for a cheap all inclusive kit. The company that makes this product has fantastic customer service by the way. Simply watch some online videos to get you started. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 8 & 5 year olds. They love it & we love it. My husband installed it in about 20min. it was very easy to install and adjust. It even feels sturdy for us adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Rakowski

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I love the length and the ease to use. The directions kind of stunk but luckily I am familiar with them. The whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our ninja line!
customer_reviews.text: We have boys of different ages so we purchased this slack line to help one of our younger ones to be able slowly build his strength and confidence for the Trailblaze ninja line that we purchased separately. Hours of fun! The company has also been very responsive and helpful with questions we had. Great product for kids (and adults!)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Solid strap great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice materials used, very high quality main strap. Doesn't lacks a thing, this is the realdeal!. Good purchasehreay thing for kids to be entertained with at home!
customer_reviews.author: Burton F. Kalister

customer_reviews.title: Our grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have grandkids ranging in age from 4 to 8 and they all love it. (Of course the 4 year old needed to be helped.) It was easy to install and it is great exercise for everyone--young or old. It seems very sturdy and well made. We are very satisfied with this product and would recommend it to anyone looking for an outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginners line!
customer_reviews.text: Found this kit to be perfect! Use it pretty often and it is holding up great. Well everything except the carrying bag for it. That ripped open after 2nd use. But other than that it’s great. I find it a lot easier to do without the training line tho. Also I wish I got a longer line now that I can walk the whole thing but for starting out this was what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The printing along the line wears off easily. The tree-protectors are kinda small
customer_reviews.text: The printing along the line wears off easily. The tree-protectors are kinda small. It is tricky to get the thing to lay flat, and the ratchet wants to swing down and twist things. I imagine this is a universal issue.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Wood

customer_reviews.title: A winner among the crowd
customer_reviews.text: SO many slack-line kits to choose from! This one is perfect, reasonably priced, easy to install, sturdy, a good value for the money and a fantastic addition to our yard. It's a wonderful go-to for our children to play on when the spirit moves them. Even fun for the "adults" in the family.
customer_reviews.author: A. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Trail Blaze slackline was hit for my boys (6 and 4). It was a great addition to the yard. We tend to leave the slack line installed for days/weeks. It has rained a lot and has held up really well. I will wrap the metal in some sort of plastic wrap to prevent it from rusting. My only issue is with the tree protectors . They are made for skinny trees and will not go around the entire trunk. Overall, I would recommend this for people with kids and novice slackliners.
customer_reviews.author: Jokya S.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love it!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We bought it for our granddaughter who is autistic and she uses it everyday! Our grandson and kids in the neighborhood use it every time they come over. I couldn’t recommend this enough! Great price, easy to install and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: bobnjanda

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and can use in many places. Took a few minutes to figure out the top and bottom lines, but then worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Inlow

customer_reviews.title: So fun to do as a family
customer_reviews.text: In our endeavor to be more active and healthy I purchased this for my husband and kiddos. We set it up in our backyard and it has become part of our work out routine on days we do not attend the gym. So fun to do as a family.
customer_reviews.author: L. Roest

customer_reviews.title: Great party fun
customer_reviews.text: I put this up myself for my son's 10th birthday party. It was easy to put up and the packaging is great and should allow for everything to be put back together for storage if we ever decide to take it down!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: we really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.text: we needed to apply WD40 to the ratchet and look up instruction to clarify how to use it. The instruction for how to use the ratchet could have been better. we really like this product and need the guide line.
customer_reviews.author: leslie joan riley

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! It was challenging and fun! I’m going to buy more to make a slack line course!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ortenzi

customer_reviews.title: Best purpose great price
customer_reviews.text: Endless fun for kids and adults during our camping trip. The kids figured out how to do flips even!
customer_reviews.author: k.tracy

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This slack line is extremely sturdy and the kids have had hours of fun with it. It is great for building balance and strength. It also looks nice in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Partin

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: "This is an excellent product--everything I hoped it would be. The straps and hardware are all heavy-duty and durable. The storage bag and folder for the safety line are much appreciated. My grandchildren (ages 4-12) love it."
customer_reviews.author: Francis Leroy Pepper

customer_reviews.title: More fun that we could have imagined.
customer_reviews.text: This slack line has been a great investment for our family. It was extremely easy to install and very easy to adjust if you want to move it up or down for different age children. The kids have played with it almost every day since we receive it. Excellent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: The J Crew

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for elementary kids
customer_reviews.text: We did an obstacle course race for elementary kids, and we used this slack line as one of the obstacles. The kids loved it and had a blast! Easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: The Holy Ninja

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING family fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a find !! I have heard a bit about slacklines, but wasn't sure if it was something I would be interested in. WOW am I glad I decided to take the plunge. Product arrived quickly, and was super simple to put up. It's been a continual use ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Vlieger

customer_reviews.title: High quality slackline and great customer support
customer_reviews.text: Felt compelled to write my first review after buying hundreds of products on Amazon. Great product. Kids and adults love it! Looking forward to fixing some ailments with better balance and strengthening my core and lower body. Had a question for customer service and they went far above and beyond what I was expecting. Highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Voss

customer_reviews.title: Not for trees of the Pacific Northwest
customer_reviews.text: I would have to warn people living in Oregon, that the trees this product is designed to go around, would be considered twigs in our state. I’m hoping to find some kind of extender package so that we can install this around the trees in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Mandolinmoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old newphews. They have older siblings and everyone loved this. Set it up next to the pool and the older kids were bouncing from rhe slack line into the pool and doing tricks within 5 mins. Super easy set up
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Issac Koch

customer_reviews.title: Fray on slack line
customer_reviews.text: Works great for now. There was a fray on the walking line right out of box, hoping that doesn’t cause weakness in the strength of the line. We shall see over time.
customer_reviews.author: OBX MOM

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Fun and Challenge
customer_reviews.text: Hey- we love this slackline kit. This was a great birthday present for my 11 yr old boy and for a 13 yr old nephew. They both love it and are on this everyday. Its great way to get a lot of physical activity that challenges them. The product is really good quality and easy to store in the packaging provided.
customer_reviews.author: Geeta

customer_reviews.title: Great slackline! Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great right out of the box. It was great for both myself and my grand kids! We all have had fun and it is easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Walk the line
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying it so far. Easy to set up but the tree wraps really aren't that big to use for your average tree. Ratchet is all metal which is nice after reading reviews of other brands. ** Slacklining not as easy as it looks!!
customer_reviews.author: Stupid

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to figure out ratchet and set-up. From the 2yr old to the 60yr old, and the teenagers in between, the challenge to walk the line keeps you coming back for more. Ordered a second line so everyone has more time walking and less time waiting for a turn.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Such a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have these! The second you step on it your core is ingaged. My spd and adhd kids love it. I love the sensory input they get from it
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: FORGET THE OLD FASHION SWING SET
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE GRAND KIDS FROM 2 - 8 AND THEY ARE ALL HAVING FUN WITH THIS. EASY TO INSTALL OR MOVE, GOOD FOR HOURS OF FUN AND TO BED EARLY. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality all in one starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, everything you need to get in the air. Kids didn't know they needed slackline in their life until this set showed up. Plenty strong for my 220#. Five stars if the tree wraps were longer. I bought an extra set of wraps with my original purchase and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to set up, but definitely fun. Great tool for balance training.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We set this up between 2 trees in our backyard. Everyone likes trying it - adults, big kids, small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: The slack line ratchet broke on the first use
customer_reviews.text: We used the slackline for about an hour and all went well. While taking it down, the ratchet bar slipped about 3 mm to the right and now the line cannot be loosened and taken off. I can’t tell if it was fault or if it is just poorly made :( the slackline now has to be cut off
customer_reviews.author: Elliott walda

customer_reviews.title: outstanding material quality; great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing for beginners as the training line gets you up training and feeling the progress right from the first day. You can actually feel how much you are relying on the training line or on your balance, and the more you practice, the less you rely on the training line. Also the quality of the materials and packing is really outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Ramos Hald Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Defective slack line
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a pretty solid product but I might have got a defective One , I notice an issue when i installed it , there is a blemish or damage to the slack line , seems like this will be a bigger problem over time
customer_reviews.author: Harold Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Didnt get everything
customer_reviews.text: Great other than I didnt get the green over head beginner line with my (order not complete).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for the kids and the adults in the family. Good exercise too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Better Instructions Needed
customer_reviews.text: More detailed directions In box & link to website to view installation & take down. Also video for beginners on using line esp 5 - 10 yr olds.
customer_reviews.author: patricia M. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Kids are having a blast with it. We don't have trees so we've strung it between 4x4 fence posts!
customer_reviews.author: mjd4311

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice and fun! the only issue I have is the felt that goes around the tree trunk. It comes in a pair so both tree should have it before wrapping the ties, but the felts are not long enough to go around the tree. Otherwise, it's nice and fun to use and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Sixto B.

customer_reviews.title: So fun for backyard!
customer_reviews.text: We use these on our back pouch pillars and they keep the kids busy! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get teens off the video games and outside!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 13th birthday and to get him off the video games a bit. He and his older brother are having a blast on it! In just a day they have already been able to improve their balancing ability and I don't forsee them getting bored anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ann

customer_reviews.title: More fun than a barrel full o' monkeys
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 & 8 year olds get their monies worth every day on this. It didn't take long for them to figure it out either. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Don Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids & old people! I’m 68 and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Kids & adults love it! Wonderful for old people’s balance skills and for children’s motor, balance development!
customer_reviews.author: Ritz708

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fun
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for our grandchildren who are six and eight and they loved it. Great way to get them outdoors and active!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Set up was quick and easy and the instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Everything was in the box as stated. Set up was quick and easy and the instructions were easy to follow. Kids and adults have all tried it out and everyone had fun and it looks like it is going to be a favourite backyard activity.
customer_reviews.author: Fraun Flerchinger

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid product
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, strong durable product, installed in minutes and the kid likes it. Total win.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Loved this kit and it was easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit and it was easy to use and very fun. I am especially happy that it had the guideline (teacher line) and also tree protectors. Something I seemed to have trouble finding in other kits. Would definitely recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yard fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easily attached to the trees in my yard. After that, it kept the kids outside for a few hours. 4 stars just for that! What? You thought I bought this for me?"
customer_reviews.author: KHarr

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at Barton Springs loved this thing. It is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Pate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Easy to install. Great Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This slackline is exactly what I expected. My 10 yr old loves it. Service was great, fast and all questions answered. Highly recommend doing business with trailblaze and this slackline.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe
customer_reviews.text: Great thick slack line. Kids love to play dodge ball while holding onto the line.
customer_reviews.author: striker

customer_reviews.title: Materials look very sturdy especially the ratchet system to tighten it
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part of setting this up was finding the right two trees. Materials look very sturdy especially the ratchet system to tighten it. Clear instructions and I had it set up for my 8 y/o granddaughter in about 10 minutes. She took to it right away and grandpa finally got a chance to rest and watch her get better with each trip down the line. She really loved it and I can see where she will get great exercise and also will acquire a skill. Pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ciambarella

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is such an affordable and quality product. The kids spend hours outside on this playing while they are really challenging themselves and their balance. Super sturdy and quality product. Lots of fun for the adults as well. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Vigliotti

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daycare kids. They LOVE it. They are all beginners and all are able to use it and have fun. Even my 3 yr old with an extra hand from me. Easy set up that I did myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Seek

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughters and they love it. Having the training line has allowed them to practice and develop their own tricks - great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Toll

customer_reviews.title: A hit at my house!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Inexpensive, healthy fun for kids. My kids and their friends LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for when our grandchildren visit but when we received it we put it up and said why not try it We are in our late
customer_reviews.text: This product is top of the line. No pun intended. We bought this for when our grandchildren visit but when we received it we put it up and said why not try it We are in our late 60's but we have found that with some practice we enjoy slack lining too. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Papapanu

customer_reviews.title: All my family loves this slackline.
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love this slackline. My kids like it to play on and learn to walk without using hands. I like it because it works for a great core workout and balance exercise. Great outdoor family time tool.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up, strong, works great. Nice carry pouch, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to install and fun for all. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brain Cell Coach, Staley

customer_reviews.title: The line is pretty and colorful
customer_reviews.text: The line is pretty and colorful,unfortunately for me my poles were to far apart.So the company gave me a full refund,Thank you so much.I didn't take in account to add the dimension around the poles for length of line.
customer_reviews.author: edie

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Best dollar for dollar purchase for my 10 year old twins yet. So simple yet allows them a focal point in the yard to hang out solo or with friends.
customer_reviews.author: jeff b

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: "Arrived on time and easy to set up. Kids (and mom) are already enjoying it!"
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: ... of the box my 17 year old daughter has loved it! It occupied much of their time at ...
customer_reviews.text: Since it first came out of the box my 17 year old daughter has loved it! It occupied much of their time at her birthday party and has been used daily since then. Easy to put up (even in the dark with flashlights!) and take down
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Slack Line!
customer_reviews.text: I set this up over 4 years ago and it is still up and working well. I am purchasing another set to replace the original one. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cleve R. Sinor

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun activity for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I ordered for my kids to have something to enjoy and play on for summer. It has become a family activity and my kids have spent hours on the line learning to balance and build skill. Most of all, they laugh and spend time together. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Complete Slackline Kit with Training Line - 60 ft Slack Line Longest Ever w/Tree Protectors Arm Trainer Ratchet Cover Ideal for Beginners Kids - Slack Lines for Backyard Ninja Tight Rope for Trees
feature_bullets: ✅THE TRAILBLAZE ADVANTAGE - join the 10,000+ satisfied worldwide customers that have been using our slackline kits for years. Ideal for kids, adults & backyard family fun

✅SUPERIOR QUALITY THAT LASTS - don't settle for poorly made ratchets or weak slack lines that fray. Our slacklines are strictly tested to hold over 300 lbs and are made from the highest-grade materials

✅BE HEALTHY & HAVE FUN AT SAME TIME - our tight rope for kids provides a full body workout whilst improving core strength, posture & mental clarity. Great addition to your american ninja warrior obstacle course
✅IMPROVE STRENGTH, BALANCE & FOCUS - Trailblaze slacklines help sharpen coordination and form for yoga, surfing, rock climbing and other balance/core-intensive sports

✅100% SATISFACTION RISK FREE PURCHASE - all Trailblaze products come with our famous LOVE IT OR 100% of YOUR MONEY BACK guarantee and 3 YR WARRANTY so you can buy in complete confidence. So what are you waiting for? Get your slack line kit now before stocks run out!
